about_the_game:
■About MEGA FANTASY Walking Monsters and Faces

This is a collection of assets created with the restriction of using only the "9-bit color" palette of 512 colors, which was commonly utilized in nostalgic home 16-bit game consoles. It employs a color scheme based on units of 15 colors per palette.

■Fully compatible with MEGA FANTASY Pixel Monster Pack
Walking monsters and their facial graphics are fully compatible with the MEGA FANTASY Pixel Monster Pack, sold separately.


83 monster types x 4 different color patterns = 332 monsters
●Characters: 53 pieces
●Faces: 42 pieces


・This pack is for use in RPG Maker Series or the engine of your choice.
・OK to be used in Commercial projects made in RPG Maker
・You may modify some of the assets (but not redistribute them) for your own game use only.
detailed_description:
■About MEGA FANTASY Walking Monsters and Faces

This is a collection of assets created with the restriction of using only the "9-bit color" palette of 512 colors, which was commonly utilized in nostalgic home 16-bit game consoles. It employs a color scheme based on units of 15 colors per palette.

■Fully compatible with MEGA FANTASY Pixel Monster Pack
Walking monsters and their facial graphics are fully compatible with the MEGA FANTASY Pixel Monster Pack, sold separately.


83 monster types x 4 different color patterns = 332 monsters
●Characters: 53 pieces
●Faces: 42 pieces


・This pack is for use in RPG Maker Series or the engine of your choice.
・OK to be used in Commercial projects made in RPG Maker
・You may modify some of the assets (but not redistribute them) for your own game use only.
